### <a id='0.1.0'></a> 0.1.0

**Release Date:** 11/04/2021

* **[Feature Improvement]** Reduce default log-cache max per source
* **[Bug Fix]** banana metadata migration does not fail on upgrade from previous LTS
* Bump banana to version `1.2.0`
